CodeChunks.CodeChunk: Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "Please complete the next Quest Objective manually.", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(26000);
